Name: Fire Sprinkler Drop Standard Threaded Steel - Dropping into braced lay-in tile HARD ceiling - 6 ft. long drop maximum, SDC D, E, or F

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing per 100 units, Standard threaded steel drop, 6 ft. long drop maximum
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: One failure is expected per 100 units.

DamageStates.Description: Spraying & Dripping Leakage at drop joints -  0.01 leaks per drop
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace sprinkler drops and minor water cleanup at broken joints.

DamageStates.Description: Drop Joints Break - Major Leakage - 0.01 breaks  per drop
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace sprinkler drops and major water cleanup at broken joints
